mapper.select: select t.*, (select name from jy_scm_warehouse where id=t.dialoutWarehouseId) as dialoutWarehouseName, (select name from jy_base_org where id=t.dialoutOrgId) as dialoutOrgName from jy_scm_pur_order_returndetail t where t.id = #{id}

select t.*, (select name from jy_scm_warehouse where id=t.dialoutWarehouseId) as dialoutWarehouseName, (select name from jy_base_org where id=t.dialoutOrgId) as dialoutOrgName from jy_scm_pur_order_returndetail t where t.returnId = #{returnId}

select t.*, (select name from jy_scm_warehouse where id=t.dialoutWarehouseId) as dialoutWarehouseName, (select name from jy_base_org where id=t.dialoutOrgId) as dialoutOrgName from jy_scm_pur_order_returndetail t where 1=1
and t.orderId=#{param.orderId}
mapper.insert: insert into jy_scm_pur_order_returndetail (id, returnId, code, name, count, count2, weight, price, dialoutOrgId, dialoutWarehouseId, remarks ) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{count2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{dialoutOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dialoutWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert.foreach: insert into jy_scm_pur_order_returndetail (id, returnId, code, name, count, count2, weight, price, dialoutOrgId, dialoutWarehouseId, remarks ) values (#{item.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.returnId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.count,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.count2,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.weight,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.price,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{item.dialoutOrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.dialoutWarehouseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
